title: Brightspace API configuration
description: The schema of Brightspace API configuration data.

clientId.description: The OAuth 2.0 client identifier used to identify the application to the LMS back-end.

clientSecret.description: The OAuth 2.0 client secret used for token exchange.

lmsUrl.description: The LMS hostname to which API requests are sent.

redirectUri.description: The OAuth 2.0 redirect URI to which users are redirected after completing authentication on the LMS.

leVersion.description: The Learning Environment product version to use.

lpVersion.description: The Learning Platform product version to use.
